revision.text: The individual Dungeon pages have Loot tables that list the drop chances of items from Dungeon Chests. It becomes slightly more likely for rarer items (those listed with lower weights and drop percentages) to drop with each additional dungeon clear, up to the maximum chance listed in the table at 500 clears. If there is a requirement listed for an item, that requirement must be met first before the item has any chance of dropping from a chest.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
